item.title: Fill: Smarty PHP plugin to fill variables in string (sprintf brother)
item.description: Today I quickly created a plugin for Smarty to fill variables inside a string (subject) using the passed parameters as variable names. I use this specially while constructing URLs because my addresses are translated and they "subjects" are always variables. This plugin does nearly the same you could do with the sprintf modifier, but I placed this behaviour inside a function. The "subject" defines the string containing the pattern to be filled and containing the vars to be filled, and the variables are any string surrounded by your preferred delimiter (defaults to %).
